response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a carefully considered price of $1,200,000. Please let me know if you require any further information or assistance in making your decision.", "product_price": 1200000}
